ai-patthana15.33:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.33:1.1_0: Endowed with defilement is a cause of goodness. Skilled in the reasons.
ai-patthana15.33:1.1_1: Neither understands the skillful and what is unskillful, not skillful.
ai-patthana15.33:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.33:2.1_0: Endowed with defilement is a condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.33:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.33:3.1_0: They haven’t declared the Truth because of defilements.
ai-patthana15.33:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
